issue.title: temu.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.temu.com/ca/mens-classic-straight-leg-jeans--business-casual-100-polyester-denim-with--leather-patch-machine-washable-black-with-stitched-detailing-plus-size-jeans-g-601099925059854.html?thumb_url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.kwcdn.com%2Fproduct%2Ffancy%2F40839d8b-a28d-49f1-9a7e-340f945eca49.jpg%3FimageView2%2F2%2Fw%2F500%2Fq%2F60%2Fformat%2Fwebp&_web_cover=thumb_url&pic_h=1800&pic_w=1350&spec_id=16086&spec_ids=16086%2C3002&from_rec=1&enable_cache=0&sw_stream_reload=1

### Ad Blocking

EasyList, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener, EasyPrivacy, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

https://www.temu.com/ca/api/hugo/hertz/user_event/report

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.alibaba.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alibaba.com/x/AzQCxL?ck=pdp](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alibaba.com%2Fx%2FAzQCxL%3Fck%3Dpdp) ### Comment > Здравствуйте. На мобильной платформе Алибаба не открывается файлы, документы, фото и видео. Мой мобильный оператор лайф, говорит что никаких блокировок через него нет. Отключаю оператора лайф, подключаю оператора скиф, всё открывает. На других ресурсах таких проблем нет, например ютуб или тик-ток. В данный момент происходит в мобильном приложении андроид. В ПК виндовс, таких проблем нет. Username: `@Владимир` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/94jez7xfre4ooc0kg8ogg0wkg4ws0k0hw8juqlood4.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/go48vmipu08owowkgkg88gg8sg4w4osmblgqkry9jk.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: 1.envato.market

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://1.envato.market/c/410396/275988/4415](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F1.envato.market%2Fc%2F410396%2F275988%2F4415) ### Comment > I'm experiencing issues with AdGuard blocking my legitimate affiliate links from https://impact.com for Themeforest and Envato Elements. The affected links are: > > https://1.envato.market/c/410396/275988/4415 > https://1.envato.market/c/410396/298927/4662 > https://1.envato.market/DWG > > Currently, I can only access these links by: > > 1. Restarting Windows > 2. Disabling AdGuard > 3. Opening the affiliate links > > I've tried adding these URLs to the user filtering rules, but they remain blocked. This is significantly impacting my work as I need constant access to these affiliate links. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kntne3d5vjkswk4g04c4sg08ogc44gg3rsf8dajae2.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8lkamg1fi34s8kswk0swkcggcgc0wg4p2qjbm7x5k0.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Tracking Protection

Other:
AdGuard Experimental,
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Custom filters: | User rules (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | I am using Eset Internet Security ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&clid=tN9bWd--CjNgXp&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1.15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.5.10&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.21.0+nightly+9+%284963%29&referrer=&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.22631.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F135.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=false)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: ground.news
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://ground.news/article/six-militants-killed-in-bannu-ibo-ispr](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fground.news%2Farticle%2Fsix-militants-killed-in-bannu-ibo-ispr) ### Comment > Top and bottom self-promo annoyances as you browse the site. There's already a white "Subscribe" button on the page, and after you open 5 articles, it will paywall block you, so there's no need for these constant annoyances. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lrevahc9fpcwcs44kkkcwk0s4ggkwk0dedf6gl4n8o.png?nc=1)
